title: 🦞 "It is absolutely imperative that every human being's freedom and human rights are respected, all over the world." - Jóhanna Sigurðardóttir
content:
Given three numbers, return their product. But, if one of the numbers is the same as another, it does not count: If two numbers are similar, return the lonely number. If all numbers are same, return 1.

Example:

$ lonelyNumber(1,2,3)
$ 6

$ lonelyNumber(6,6,4)
$ 4

$ lonelyNumber(7,7,7)
$ 1
